author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students of Corporation schools got an exposure to skills of yoga at a programme organised by Health Department of Thoothukudi Corporation here on Wednesday.

Mayor A.P.R. Anthony Grace inaugurated the awareness and orientation programme on yoga at Corporation Higher Secondary School, Samuvelpuram here. The objective was to help refresh and rejuvenate the body and mind of every student, who could stay healthy at this stage of their lifecycle.

A common venue for conducting yoga classes daily is yet to be decided, said City Health Officer Pradeep V. Krishnakumar. The yoga trainers would offer classes free of cost to the students.
title: Yoga training for students
